description: Cypress test suite implementing the official TodoMVC tests for various frameworks, covering functionalities like adding, editing, completing, filtering, and persisting todos.

methods.name: skipTestsWithKnownIssues
methods.description: Hides tests with known issues based on the framework.

methods.name: checkTodosInLocalStorage
methods.description: Checks if localStorage contains todos with specific text.

methods.name: checkCompletedKeywordInLocalStorage
methods.description: Checks if localStorage contains any completed todos.

methods.name: checkNumberOfTodosInLocalStorage
methods.description: Verifies the number of todos stored in localStorage.

methods.name: checkNumberOfCompletedTodosInLocalStorage
methods.description: Verifies the number of completed todos in localStorage.
